pr_nlx_144048_1.title: Classification learning and reversal
pr_nlx_144048_1.description: Subjects performed two blocks of an event-related probabilistic classification learning task. They then performed two more blocks of the same task with the reward contingencies reversed.
pr_nlx_144048_1.cognitive_task_seq_name: 1 Probabilistic classification task, 2 Probabilistic classification task
